!title: Creamy Chickpea Curry
!size: 2 portions
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: A Taste of Thai (http://www.atasteofthai.com/thai-recipes/creamy-chickpea-curry-recipe/)
!lang: en

# 1 onion, chopped
* fry until brown

# 1 garlic, chopped
* add, sauté until soft

# 1tbsp indian yellow curry paste
# 75ml coconut milk
* dissolve
* stir in and reduce

# 200g chickpeas
# 175ml coconut milk
# 1tbsp soy sauce
* add
* bring to a boil
* cook 3—4 minutes

# 1 tomato, chopped
# 1/2tbsp palm sugar
# 1/2tbsp lime juice
* stir in
* simmer 1—2 minutes

# 1tbsp cilantro, chopped
* stir in
* serve rice
